titles.title: To require gifts of less than $100 to be disregarded in determining income under the supplemental security income program under title XVI of the Social Security Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/11/2002--Introduced. Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) (SSI) of the Social Security Act to require gifts of less than $100 to be disregarded in determining income under the SSI program.
